ai-tika-vin07t12:1_0: The second training rule on what is conceived
ai-tika-vin07t12:2_0: Firstly, it is to be relinquished.
ai-tika-vin07t12:3_1: The second rains residence was given for the second wives, and that the giving of support for the remainder should be given back.
ai-tika-vin07t12:3_2: Hence it is said: “Well then, they should be in the same place.”
ai-tika-vin07t12:3_3: Understanding that out-of-season robe-cloth is obliging with three parts.
ai-tika-vin07t12:4_1: In the third very third rainy season.
ai-tika-vin07t12:4_2: the two, namely, thecloth and the perception of the robe-cloth in accordance with the Sakyan clans,
ai-tika-vin07t12:5_1: After giving the fourteenth parts, he summons him,
ai-tika-vin07t12:5_2: Yamaka should be eaten by one that is needed;
ai-tika-vin07t12:5_3: It is the reason for the sake of substance,  another’s preference, for the sake of non-existence.
ai-tika-vin07t12:6_1: She was reborn in the fifth.
ai-tika-vin07t12:6_2: if it is not to be given to a trainee nun;
ai-tika-vin07t12:6_3: But then they get carried out to exchange one of their mothers and father, the Koṇḍañña surges her on, saying ‘It is allowable for us,’ and then said, ‘It is to be done by us.”
ai-tika-vin07t12:7_0: if he is the sixth gateway;
ai-tika-vin07t12:8_0: By means of loving-kindness is the meaning.
ai-tika-vin07t12:9_0: * the wisdom there is from the scriptures in each of the twelve stridess,
ai-tika-vin07t12:10_0: The one requested by relinquishment is finished.
